5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim, from his father, that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to pray two Rak’ah after Jumu’ah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer after Friday
